name: Trouble In The Manor
description: Trouble In The Manor is an online multiplayer game which takes place in a spooky far away manor. You are designated one of three roles upon each round: innocent, bloodhound, or murderer.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Processor: Intel or AMD 2.8 GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 128MB VRAM, DirectX 9.0c DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 25 MB available space
